title: Building the Ultimate MacBook Pro
description: Thanks to LastPass for sponsoring this video! Create a LastPass account for free here!  The Apple MacBook Pro finally gets the ultimate build treatment.  Linedock for 13" MacBook Pro:  Das Model S Keyboard for Mac on Amazon:  Logitech MX Master 2S on Amazon:  Gigabyte Gaming Box External Thunderbolt 3 RX 580 Graphics Card on Amazon:  CalDigit TS3 Plus Thunderbolt 3 Dock on Amazon:  Double Laptop Vertical Stand on Amazon:  LG UltraFine 5K Display:  2016/2017 MacBook Pro Case on Amazon:    By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
